title: "Microsoft rains more machine learning on Azure cloud"
excerpt: "Microsoft made sure to include Azure in the AI-fest that was the Build 2023 developer conference this week. As enterprises consider experimenting with or deploying generative AI, they may well look to public clouds and similar scalable compute and storage infrastructure to run things like large-language models (LLMs)."
